page.title: 11A SCHOOLGIRL'S DAY.
page.content:
THIS IS AN ACCOUNT OF THE DAY OF AN 11 YEAR OLD GIRL IN THIS AREA.
In the morning my mom wakes me up at 7.40am.,I get dressed in clothes of my own choice.I eat breakfast which is cereal or egg,toast and a cup of tea. While I am listening to B.R.M.B.my brother gets up and my mom makes my sandwiches and then I start out to walk to school at 8.30am.I usually meet my friend on the way. School starts at 8.55 and we have the register and then go downstairs for assembly.Afterwards we have maths.and at 10. 40 it is playtime.We ring the bell at 10.55 and then we have English.Then lunchtime arrives and we eat our sandwiches in the hall and if it is fine we go out to play. In the afternoon we have other lesson eg. P.E. Art,Craft or Topic.
